code: import R from"ramda";var initialState=[];export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"ADD_PHONE_TO_BASKET":return R.append(action.payload,state);case"REMOVE_PHONE_FROM_BASKET":return R.without(R.of(action.payload),state);case"CLEAN_BASKET":return initialState;default:return state;}});
